message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this unique product. I believe it holds significant value for someone with your expertise. To kick things off, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, the value of this product to the right buyer is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000. This is a very competitive price for something of this caliber.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000.
Bob, your offer is getting closer to the value I place on this product. I'm willing to accept a price of $1,150,000. I believe this represents a fair compromise for both of us.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1,100,000.
